snippet: The overall World Cup champion Marcel Hirscher helped host Austria win the team event and earn its first gold medal at the Alpine skiing world championships in Schladming.
abstract: Austria defeats Sweden, 4-0, in the World Cup skiing final, aided by overall champion Marcel Hirscher.
lead_paragraph: The overall World Cup champion Marcel Hirscher helped host Austria win the team event and earn its first gold medal at the Alpine skiing world championships in Schladming.
